game.name: Mexico Rex
game.description:
After making lots of destruction in other popular cities, this hungry dinosaur has headed to Mexico. The problem is that your pre-historic friend is new to the city so he wants your help in completing his multiple missions. Would you give like to give it a try? Join Mexico Rex and gear up to guide this ferocious T-rex and consume and destroy everything that you see on his way! Your objective in this latest adventure game is to eat humans and shoot down vehicles. 
The bigger havoc you create the higher score you will be able to make in the end. Make sure to control this savage beast like never before and complete his missions before the bullets run out. Try to munch down all the humans and objects that you see on the road of the city! Focus only to cause as much mayhem and chaos as possible in this HTML5 platform game! It will be your duty to check if he can run through the streets of Mexico properly. 
Your hungry beast is armed with a machine gun so do not forget to shoot bullets on his target. The entire country has already come into action so it is easy to spot soldiers at multiple locations. You do not need to be scared of them, but guide your Rex to destroy everyone and everything. Good luck to shoot vehicles, smash buildings and eat all humans to complete each level with 3 jalapenos! This cool shooter challenge features 18 unique and challenging levels to play through.
game.metaTitle: Mexico Rex, Platform Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Mexico Rex at atmegame.com ! We have selected this platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: L ICON TO MOVE , RIGHT ICON TO JUMP AND BITE
game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D TO MOVE L-CLICK OF MOUSE TO BITE
